Package net.explorviz.security.server.resources

Class UserResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.security.server.resources.UserResource
  • @Path("v1/users")
public class UserResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides several Endpoints for user management.

      • newUser

        @POST
@Consumes("application/vnd.api+json")
@Produces("application/vnd.api+json")
@RolesAllowed("admin")
public User newUser​(User user)
        Creates and persists a new user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to create
        Returns:
        the user object, that was saved

      • updateUser

        @PATCH
@Path("{id}")
@RolesAllowed("admin")
@Produces("application/vnd.api+json")
@Consumes("application/vnd.api+json")
public User updateUser​(@PathParam("id")
                       java.lang.String id,
                       User updatedUser)
        Updates the details of a already existing user. The values of the targeted user will be overridden by the values of an updatedUser. All attributes that are null are ignored.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the user to update
        updatedUser - - a User object containing the changes. All fields set to null will be ignored when updating.
        Returns:
        the updated user

        Returns:
